nodes.text: The Data Center was a building that housed a major database of the Galactic Empire located on the surface levels of Coruscant.

In the months prior to the Battle of Yavin, a Bothan slicer was able to slice false identity and history backing Kell Bircher's insertion in the Imperial Military. Two months after the Battle of Yavin, Darth Vader and a squad of elite stormtroopers, along with Ensign Nanda, Lord Vader's aide, visited the Center to find how the information concerning Bircher was sliced into the data. During this operation, Vader ordered the Center's Chief of Security shot and tortured an attached major for several hours.
The Data Center was an enormous monolith-like structure that was made of a streamlined turquoise material.
